Posts.Content: Jun 14, 2018 08:05AM Johannegrammy wrote: well not much happened since 2 weeks ago with trying to get an ultrasound or even a mammogram i finally saw my Dr 2 days ago that tried to drain my breast but only was able to get about 1cm of mostly blood the pain has spread to arm pit my back and my rib cage and now i feel sick to my stomach like a nauseas feeling all day headache and no energy My breast keeps on growing and his very itchy on the nipple the lump is hard and is now covering my whole breast and spreading to my arm pit it is swollen and hard this lump has grown from a pea size to this in 1 month and is not stopping Im upset cause im still waiting to get things going, my Dr said its Fybrocystic and will most likely will have to get surgery to remove it but they dont seem to b in a hurry
Posts.Title: Just worried Johannegrammy Johannegrammy
